KH.content: khōra never reached, broached [entamer?], touched, exhausted: not subject, not subjectile
KH.linkedContent: khōra never reached, broached [entamer?], touched, exhausted: not subject, not subjectile

KH.content: a virginity rebellious against anthropomorphism, not order of eidos or mimemes
KH.linkedContent: a virginity rebellious against anthropomorphism, not order of eidos or mimemes

KH.content: [re: a logic of living memory in Timaeus] effacement (of secondary impressions) would be the figure for the middle (mil-lieu), both for space and time, would not affect originary impression (that of child), ineffaceable once engraved in virgin wax
KH.linkedContent: [re: a logic of living memory in Timaeus] effacement (of secondary impressions) would be the figure for the middle (mil-lieu), both for space and time, would not affect originary impression (that of child), ineffaceable once engraved in virgin wax

KH.content: what about a virgin wax that is always virgin, always older, preceding any possible impression, and thus younger, achronic, anachronistic [cf. SW pp. 322-23]
KH.linkedContent: what about a virgin wax that is always virgin, always older, preceding any possible impression, and thus younger, achronic, anachronistic [cf. SW pp. 322-23]

KH.content: khōra so virginal it doesn’t even have the figure of a virgin anymore
KH.linkedContent: khōra so virginal it doesn’t even have the figure of a virgin anymore

R.content: Heidegger: “only a God can save us (Nur noch ein Gott kann uns retten)”; Derrida observes communication in Heidegger btwn retten (to save), das Heilen (the Unscathed, the safe, the sound), and das Freie (free, also, save, preserve, immunity) > in tact, untouched, purify
R.linkedContent: Heidegger: “only a God can save us (Nur noch ein Gott kann uns retten)”; Derrida observes communication in Heidegger btwn retten (to save), das Heilen (the Unscathed, the safe, the sound), and das Freie (free, also, save, preserve, immunity) > in tact, untouched, purify

FK.content: [bottom w/out bottom of always virgin impassibility] khōra of tomorrow in languages we no longer, don’t yet, speak: makes way w/out generosity, neither divine, nor human > dispersion of ashes not promised there, nor death given
FK.linkedContent: [bottom w/out bottom of always virgin impassibility] khōra of tomorrow in languages we no longer, don’t yet, speak: makes way w/out generosity, neither divine, nor human > dispersion of ashes not promised there, nor death given

PP.content: “through her games, Pharmacia has dragged down to death a virginal purity and an unpenetrated interior”
PP.linkedContent: “through her games, Pharmacia has dragged down to death a virginal purity and an unpenetrated interior”

VP.content: for Husserl, non-presence does not dissimulate, surprise, presence, it allows the ever reborn virginity of presence
VP.linkedContent: for Husserl, non-presence does not dissimulate, surprise, presence, it allows the ever reborn virginity of presence

FSW.content: Freud wants to maintain a permanence of trace and the virginity of the receiving substance [see pp. 204, 223] > such apparatus almost unimaginable
FSW.linkedContent: Freud wants to maintain a permanence of trace and the virginity of the receiving substance [see pp. 204, 223] > such apparatus almost unimaginable

FSW.content: Φ neurones (no trace of impression, perceptual), Ψ neurones (retain trace)
FSW.linkedContent: Φ neurones (no trace of impression, perceptual), Ψ neurones (retain trace)

FSW.content: Freud’s interest in finding virginal writing surface, a slate that does not conserve imprints, erases traces
FSW.linkedContent: Freud’s interest in finding virginal writing surface, a slate that does not conserve imprints, erases traces

T.content: margin not a secondary virginity (but an other text)—an inexhaustible reserve, stereographic activity of an entirely other ear
T.linkedContent: margin not a secondary virginity (but an other text)—an inexhaustible reserve, stereographic activity of an entirely other ear

T.content: khōra—as tympanum, watches over its margins as virgin, homogenous, negative space, leaving its outside outside, w/out mark, w/out opposition > ready to receive and repercuss type
T.linkedContent: khōra—as tympanum, watches over its margins as virgin, homogenous, negative space, leaving its outside outside, w/out mark, w/out opposition > ready to receive and repercuss type

DS.content: mime inaugurates: breaks into white page
DS.linkedContent: mime inaugurates: breaks into white page

DS.content: at the edge of being (au bord de l’être): the entre of the hymen, masked gap, veil of virginity (where nothing’s taken place) & consummation, penetration of antre, release [one in the other] > mirror never passed through, ice never broke, at the edge of being
DS.linkedContent: at the edge of being (au bord de l’être): the entre of the hymen, masked gap, veil of virginity (where nothing’s taken place) & consummation, penetration of antre, release [one in the other] > mirror never passed through, ice never broke, at the edge of being

DS.content: hymen, comme tissu, envelops, outwits (déjoue) philosphemes, ontologies, dialectics, les retourne et les inscrit, suspense in the antre of perpenetration
DS.linkedContent: hymen, comme tissu, envelops, outwits (déjoue) philosphemes, ontologies, dialectics, les retourne et les inscrit, suspense in the antre of perpenetration

DS.content: play of hymen at once vicious & sacred; nothing more perverse than rending penetration that leaves virgin womb in tact
DS.linkedContent: play of hymen at once vicious & sacred; nothing more perverse than rending penetration that leaves virgin womb in tact

DS.content: virginity (newness, wholeness) always overlaid w/ opposite—virginity submits to operation of hymen of its own accord
DS.linkedContent: virginity (newness, wholeness) always overlaid w/ opposite—virginity submits to operation of hymen of its own accord

DS.content: “the masculine is turned back on the feminine: whole adventure of sexual difference” > in same blow: fold ruptures virginity it marks as virginity, folding over its secret > nothing more virginal (and at same time) more purloined/penetrated than secret (loses smooth simplicity of its surface)
DS.linkedContent: “the masculine is turned back on the feminine: whole adventure of sexual difference” > in same blow: fold ruptures virginity it marks as virginity, folding over its secret > nothing more virginal (and at same time) more purloined/penetrated than secret (loses smooth simplicity of its surface)

DS.content: secret differs before letter opener separates lips of the book, divided from/by itself, like hymen > after the fact, it remains what it was, virgin
DS.linkedContent: secret differs before letter opener separates lips of the book, divided from/by itself, like hymen > after the fact, it remains what it was, virgin

POS.content: transcendental signified as idea of a virgin, untouched translation

OTO.content: the living on of an ageless virgin mother (living long enough to bury her child), & the already dead father > logic of glas, and obsequence [one finds this in Christ’s family]
OTO.linkedContent: the living on of an ageless virgin mother (living long enough to bury her child), & the already dead father > logic of glas, and obsequence [one finds this in Christ’s family]

TB.content: Benjamin’s untouchable (unberührbar) reminds Derrida of the hymen, of the wedding gown more visibly
TB.linkedContent: Benjamin’s untouchable (unberührbar) reminds Derrida of the hymen, of the wedding gown more visibly

TB.content: untouchable: fascinates, orients work of translator

text will be even more virgin, intact, after passage of translation: hymen, sign of virginity, more jealous of itself after the other hymen, the contract signed, marriage consummated (untouchable remnant remains intact)
TB.linkedContent: text will be even more virgin, intact, after passage of translation: hymen, sign of virginity, more jealous of itself after the other hymen, the contract signed, marriage consummated (untouchable remnant remains intact)

TR.content: [re: “to swear”] délire names extraordinary coincidence of irrationality of machine (beyond my control) & absolute sincerity (authentic innocence of my intentions)
TR.linkedContent: [re: “to swear”] délire names extraordinary coincidence of irrationality of machine (beyond my control) & absolute sincerity (authentic innocence of my intentions)

TR.content: coincidence of infinite guilt & certainty in absolute, virgin, intact innocence> btwn infinite guilt & absence of guilty conscience
TR.linkedContent: coincidence of infinite guilt & certainty in absolute, virgin, intact innocence> btwn infinite guilt & absence of guilty conscience

TR.content: play with marionettes, Marion of the ribbon [re: Rousseau’s Confessions] as the instant of fictive generations, like all those automatic virgins ambling about btwn Gospels & Kleist
TR.linkedContent: play with marionettes, Marion of the ribbon [re: Rousseau’s Confessions] as the instant of fictive generations, like all those automatic virgins ambling about btwn Gospels & Kleist

D.content: pure present: la plénitude inentamée, la continuité vierge de la non-coupure (not yet having been written, à la veille du jeu)
D.linkedContent: pure present: la plénitude inentamée, la continuité vierge de la non-coupure (not yet having been written, à la veille du jeu)

CIN.content: why the phrase “il y a là cendre” doesn’t belong to him [Derrida] > cinder lent, given, to so many others, cinder remains virginal (the only thing he loves), in tact (intacte), the sentence doesn’t even say the cinder
CIN.linkedContent: why the phrase “il y a là cendre” doesn’t belong to him [Derrida] > cinder lent, given, to so many others, cinder remains virginal (the only thing he loves), in tact (intacte), the sentence doesn’t even say the cinder

OG.content: supplement is maddening, it breaches/broaches (entame) our pleasure and our virginity [hymen]
OG.linkedContent: supplement is maddening, it breaches/broaches (entame) our pleasure and our virginity [hymen]

CIR.content: day of circumcision: a de-cision was taken in me w/out me > Jealousy & virginity, my two nipples
CIR.linkedContent: day of circumcision: a de-cision was taken in me w/out me > Jealousy & virginity, my two nipples
